attributes.action: Change the rules for the Child Maintenance
attributes.additional_details: Stop children and the payment receiving parent from going without as the paying parent holds all the power.
attributes.background: Give better guidelines to the Child Maintenace to use against parents who do not comply with paying

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about non-payment of child maintenance, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

The Child Maintenance Service can already take a range of actions to collect arrears of child maintenance. You can find out what actions the CMS can take here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/research-briefings/cbp-7774/

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Non-payment of child maintenance a criminal offence with custodial penalties: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634816

Conduct a full review of the Child Maintenance Service: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/634098

If you want the Government to do something different to the above petitions you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
